attributes.action: Make it optional for parents whether to send students back to school or not.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it is still risky for schools to open, and if all schools do open across the UK if students catch COVID-19 then of course population will be effected. I want the citizens of the UK to feel safe. But not in danger in school. As some students are still very young and do not know how to protect themselves from the pandemic.
attributes.background: The cases of COVID-19 is still very high. And there is currently no cure for the virus. Schools are a very crowded place. The government is not allowing 6 groups of people to meet up in public. But then again having hundreds and thousands of students and teachers in school?
